price: 29. Kuwa (Xaqa) rumeeyey oo fala samaha aayatiin wanaagsan14 bay leeyihiin iyo rug u laabasho fiican (Janno).
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ طُوبَىٰ لَهُمۡ وَحُسۡنُ مَـَٔابٖ
footnotes: 14. Nabigu s.c.w. wuxuu yidhi: Jannada waxaa ah geed uu u socdo hooskeeda kan gaadiid saaran boqol sano oo uusan goyneyn. W.w. Al-Bukhaari.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti ṭūbā lahum waḥus'nu maābin
